Class HistogramInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bettertrialbook.statistic.HistogramInfo

  • public class HistogramInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A model to to hold relevant data for the statistics and histogram graph

      • collectFrequency

        Finds the frequency for each respective bin
        Returns:

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Helper Method
        Returns:

      • getMaxForEachBin

                              int requiredBin)
        Helper Method: Calculate the maximum value for each bin
        Parameters:
        diffForBin - The difference within the bin
        requiredBin - The number of bins we are going to created for the Histogram
        Returns:
        Return the list of integer contains the maximum value for each bin in ascending order.

        public double[] getCategory(int requiredBin)

        Returns:
